resources.string: Welcome to the Moble,the mobile learning app!
With this app you will start learning the Portuguese language.
This app consists out of three parts:

(1) An entry test, to evaluate your current level of understanding of the Portuguese language. 
 
 (2) A learning period of 7 days. During which you will receive reminders throughout the day of Portuguese words, and will be asked to take a short quize at the end of each day. 
 
 (3) A final test, to evaluate how much you' ve learned.
